main event: On 10 May 1952, an Air Force Colonel and his wife observed two unidentified silver disc-shaped objects in the sky above Albuquerque, New Mexico.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 5 to 10 minutes,The objects were maneuvering straight and level, radar attempts to locate the objects were unsuccessful, The Colonel's sighting began approximately 30 seconds after a civilian reported a cylindrical-shaped object traveling at high speed, Two objects were eventually sighted with one appearing about 15 minutes after the first.
witness description: Air Force Colonel and his wife
